snippet: Charming Shoppes, the owner of the Lane Bryant line of women's clothing stores, agreed to sell itself to a rival, the Ascena Retail Group, for about $890 million.
abstract: Charming Shoppes, the owner of the Lane Bryant line of women's clothing stores, agreed to sell itself to a rival, the Ascena Retail Group, for about $890 million.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Owner of Lane Bryant Sold to Rival for $890 Million
